title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
content:
If you shop online (and who doesnâ€™t these days?), then chances are youâ€™ve already interacted with Yotpo. Weâ€™re a leading eCommerce retention marketing platform, on a mission to help brands of all sizes turn one-time shoppers into customers for life. Loyalty programs, SMS and email marketing, subscriptions, and reviews are our bread and butter, but we have more solutions up our sleeve, too.
We have teams across the world, including the US, Canada, UK, Israel, Bulgaria, and Australia â€” and weâ€™re still growing. Our primary goal is to deliver the best technology in the industry.
You can hear all about it in our latest brand video. 
Sounds exciting? Then read on, because weâ€™re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.Sounds exciting? Then read on, because weâ€™re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.
 
We are looking for a talented Full-Stack Engineer to join our Platform Group.
Our domain is responsible for taking Yotpoâ€™s platform to its new heights as we are progressing its core synergetic functionalities within our product-lines. This is what makes the platform the best-in-class experience for our customers.
If working in a hyper-growth startup with cutting edge technologies and a dynamic team sounds interesting - then this is the place for you!
As part of your role you will:
Learn and deep dive into new technologies in an agile environment.
Work with a wide variety of technologies and services.
Have responsibility for large-scale, event-based services emphasizing efficiency and optimization.
Work in a cloud-based environment with the most advanced development ecosystem and top technologies - Docker / Kubernetes / Prometheus / Okteto / AWS / Jenkins / Travis / Grafana / Coralogix.
Own responsibility for Yotpoâ€™s key strategic systems with extreme-ownership practices and long-term domain involvement.
Have E2E ownership - ideation, design, development, build, release, and monitoring.
Requirements:
BSc. in Computer Science or equivalent.
At least 6 years of experience as a full-stack engineer in Java Spring
Deep understanding of OOP, SOLID, and essential design patterns
Experience delivering complex systems, from design and planning to development, testing, deployment, and production maintenance.
Experience with microservices architecture and cloud technologies (Docker, K8S, AWS as advantage)
Experience with modern web UI framework (Angular is considered an advantage)
Deep understanding and hands-on experience working with various persistence layers (SQL, NoSQL, K/V).
Hands-on experience using Monitoring and Logging tools - (Grafana/Kibana/Coralogix/Newrelic)
The perfect candidate will be:
Great communication and collaboration skills, with various interfaces(PM, Dev teams, DevOps, Support)
Business understanding, seeing the whole picture
Proactiveness and get-things-done attitude
Responsible and owner, production-oriented
No ego, a real team player
Empower others, be a mentor to other teammates
Growth-driven mindset, continuous improvement
Data-based decisions, measure success in business impact
